did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Record of Weather and Stages of the Colorado River, 1854-1856
did.abstract: Fragment of weather records and states of the Colorado River, kept by Jaeger at the Yuma Ferry, April 1854 to Jan. 1856.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Restricted; patrons use photocopy due to fragile condition.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Record of Weather and Stages of the Colorado River (AZ 136). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Ferryman and adventurer; operated ferry across Colorado River at Yuma, Ariz., 1850-1877.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized in chronological arrangement.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Fragment of weather records and states of the Colorado River, kept by Jaeger at the Yuma Ferry, April 1854 to Jan. 1856.

relatedmaterial.p: Related materials at AZ 133, AZ 134, AZ 135, AZ 528.
